meanings.definition: To retract or withdraw a wish.
meanings.sent1: She quickly unwishes her wish upon realizing the consequences.
meanings.sent2: He unwishes his wish for a new toy after seeing his friend's broken one.
meanings.sent3: The girl unwishes her wish for endless candy when she gets a stomach ache.
meanings.sent4: He unwishes his wish for fame as soon as he realizes the loss of privacy.
meanings.sent5: The boy unwishes his wish for superpowers after accidentally breaking things with them.

meanings.definition: To regret or feel sorry for a wish made.
meanings.sent1: She unwishes her wish for a snow day when she sees her friends disappointed faces.
meanings.sent2: He unwishes his wish for a pet when he realizes the responsibility it entails.
meanings.sent3: The man unwishes his wish for a million dollars when he learns it was stolen money.
meanings.sent4: She unwishes her wish for a perfect life when she sees the beauty in imperfection.
meanings.sent5: He unwishes his wish for a time machine after understanding the importance of living in the present.
